mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_vehicle_manage_log ( user_id, type, description, result, is_app, udp_id, token ) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{type}, #{description}, #{result}, IFNULL(#{isApp}, 0), #{udpBizId}, fn_uuid_to_bin(#{token}))
mapper.select:
select from tbl_vehicle_manage_log vl,tbl_user u where vl.user_id=u.id
and u.id=#{user.id}
and u.account like CONCAT('%',#{user.account},'%')
and u.name like CONCAT('%',#{user.name},'%')

SELECT
#{token} token, description, result, response_msg -> '$.id' `responseMsg.id`, CAST( TRIM( BOTH '\"' FROM ( response_msg -> '$.result' ) ) AS CHAR(10) ) `responseMsg.result`, response_msg -> '$.tag' `responseMsg.tag`, response_msg -> '$.code' `responseMsg.code`, CAST( TRIM( BOTH '\"' FROM ( response_msg -> '$.msg' ) ) AS CHAR(255) ) `responseMsg.msg` FROM tbl_vehicle_manage_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_app = #{isApp} AND udp_id = #{udpBizId} AND token = fn_uuid_to_bin(#{token})
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
